title: Episode 156 - Deep Fakes
description: In this episode we talk with Nigel Cannings about Deep fakes... or do we... is this even us, are you even you? html:
Episode 156 Guest: Nigel Cannings

17 May 2021 |

In this episode we talk with Nigel Cannings about Deep fakes... or do we... is this even us, are you even you?

Comments

Please leave a comment, positive, negative or just something weird.

Nigel Cannings

Nigel Cannings is the CTO at Intelligent Voice and CEO at MeetMyna.
He has over 25 years' experience in both Law and Technology, is the founder of Intelligent Voice Ltd and a pioneer in all things voice.

Nigel is also a regular speaker at industry events not limited to NVIDIA, IBM, HPE and AI Financial Summits.

Guest Episodes:

  • Episode 156 - Deep Fakes
